reviewText: This was great,all three movies on one DVD.gift for husband ,hes a big fan of writer so to get all three at such a great price was wonderful. thanks
Title: Quentin Tarantino Triple Feature

reviewText: If you love the Quentin Tarantino movies i recomend this three pack is good, remember, these movies were his first production.
Title: Quentin Tarantino Triple Feature

reviewerName: Dr. Wilson Trivino "Success- living the life ...
reviewText: I had read a collection of interviews by Tarentino and wanted to revisit these movies. It is a good collection with 3 different DVDs.  Has commentary on each disk & trailers. This would be good for any private collection.
Title: Quentin Tarantino Triple Feature

reviewText: I love Tarantino and it was a great deal to get all three movies in one.  It saves lots of space, too.
Title: Quentin Tarantino Triple Feature

reviewText: All three movies have terrific themes. One of them lags quite a bit in delivery style, but makes up for it in casting.Frankly, Tarantino relies on superb casting to carry ocassionally lame plot lines .. but pulls it off splendidly.In short, these are cult classics .. not Cinema Classics.Ya like them, or ya don't.
Title: Quentin Tarantino Triple Feature
